backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (Test, Student, Slider, CurrentAffairs, Newspaper, etc.) and exposing public query/update functions for tests, students, sliders, current affairs, newspapers, rankers, contacts, and admin/student session management with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state to the new schema by adding `negativeMarkValue` to tests, converting student records to mobile-number-based auth, and initializing empty maps for sliders, currentAffairs, and newspapers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (image slider, manage sliders panel, daily current affairs/newspaper sections, etc.) to their corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, key functionality, and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'Success Test Series Hub' that mounts the app at `#root` and loads `src/main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that implements client-side routing via `useState` and `window.history.pushState`, rendering Admin, Student, or public Home pages and conditionally showing the Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: A sidebar navigation component for the admin panel with links to tests, rankers, contacts, sliders, current affairs, newspapers, and students, plus logout functionality.
A React component that lets users input a topic and difficulty level to generate AI-powered quiz questions, displaying results with multilingual (Hindi/English) support.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: A contact form component that collects name, email, and message, submits them via a mutation hook, and shows a success state upon completion.
frontend/src/components/CurrentAffairsFo: A modal dialog form for admins to add a new current affairs entry with a date and content field, using the useAddCurrentAffairs mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/DailyCurrentAffa: Displays a date-sorted list of daily current affairs entries fetched from the backend, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/DailyNewspaper.t: Displays a date-sorted list of daily newspaper entries with external links, fetched via the useGetNewspapers hook, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ExamCategories.t: Renders a row of filterable exam category buttons (UPSC, SSC, Railway, etc.) with color-coded active/hover styles and translation support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with logo, copyright year, privacy/terms links, and a caffeine.ai attribution badge with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/FreeTests.tsx: Displays a grid of free (price=0) tests fetched from the API, with loading/error/empty states, and opens a TestTakingModal when a test is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, smooth-scroll nav links, EN/HI language toggle, student login button, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with a headline, subheadline, CTA buttons to scroll to free tests or paid plans, and three stat counters (students, tests, categories).
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Auto-advancing image carousel that fetches slider data, supports manual prev/next navigation, dot indicators, and shows placeholder states while loading or when empty.
frontend/src/components/NewspaperFormMod: Modal dialog form for adding a newspaper entry (date + URL), using the useAddNewspaper mutation and displaying inline validation errors.
frontend/src/components/PaidTestSeries.t: Displays a pricing section with three test series plans (Basic, Standard, Premium) as cards with features and buy buttons, plus bank payment details for manual payment.
frontend/src/components/PaymentComingSoo: A modal dialog that informs users that online payment is coming soon, optionally showing the test title and price, with a close button.
A dialog form for admins to add a new ranker by entering student name, exam category, and score, submitting via the useAddRanker mutation.
A dialog form for admins to add a new homepage slider entry by providing an image URL and optional title, submitting via the useAddSlider mutation.
frontend/src/components/TestFormModal.ts: A comprehensive admin dialog for creating or editing a test, including fields for title, category, price, negative marking, and a dynamic list of bilingual (English/Hindi) questions with options and explanations.
A full-screen modal that lets users take a test by selecting answers per question, then submits and displays a score with negative marking applied and per-question result feedback.
frontend/src/components/TopRankers.tsx: Displays a leaderboard table of top-ranked students fetched via `useGetTopRankers`, with rank-specific icons, colors, and row styles for the top 3 positions.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Renders a 4-column feature grid section highlighting platform benefits (AI questions, adaptive tests, live proctoring, analytics) with themed icons and colors.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for managing the app's language ('en' or 'hi'), persisting the selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Manages an admin session token in localStorage and exposes a React hook that syncs token state across storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout state and identity to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching public data (tests, rankers, sliders, etc.) and admin mutations (login, CRUD operations) against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentAuth.ts: Manages student session token and name in localStorage, dispatching custom events on changes and exposing a hook that syncs state across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Returns a translation function `t` that resolves keys against the current language's translations, falling back to English, using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Rajdhani, Inter), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a deep navy/gold/sky color theme via CSS custom properties and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContacts.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays contact form submissions in a read-only table with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCurrentAffairs.t: Admin page for managing current affairs entries, supporting listing (sorted by date), adding via a modal, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard shell that renders the sidebar and routes to the appropriate admin sub-panel based on the current path, redirecting to login if no session token exists.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with a username/password form that authenticates via a mutation, stores the session token, and navigates to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNewspapers.tsx: Admin page for managing daily newspaper link entries, supporting listing (sorted by date), adding via a modal, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRankers.tsx: Admin page for managing leaderboard rankers, displaying a table with rank, student name, category, and score, with options to add or delete rankers via a modal and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSliders.tsx: Admin page for managing homepage image sliders, showing a grid of slider cards with image previews and delete functionality, plus a modal for adding new sliders.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStudents.tsx: Admin read-only page that lists all registered students in a table with their profile photo, mobile number, student ID, and registration date.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTests.tsx: Admin page for managing exam tests with a table showing ID, title, category, price, and question count, supporting add, edit, and delete operations via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard page displaying the logged-in student's profile with photo upload capability, logout functionality, and navigation to other student sections.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLogin.tsx: Two-step student login page that collects a mobile number to request an OTP and then verifies the OTP to authenticate and navigate to the student dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Defines bilingual (English and Hindi) translation strings for all UI text across the app, including navigation, hero, exam categories, tests, contact, and admin sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark navy/gold theme with custom colors, fonts (Rajdhani, Inter), shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the app.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, feature list, architectural notes, known issues, and planned additions like OTP login, image slider, bilingual tests, and admin panel enhancements.
